Dear Shinsengumi fan,
To some of us, this disgusting is a good disgusting.=
 Relax, no one's 
mad at you for having an opinion. But this is a forum for=
 intelligent 
discussion and not the, "oh ewwwww disgusting," and leave it =
at that. 
Least you can do is tell us why.  Or maybe, tell us why you were =

offended.  You know, be civil about it, or els the poor artist may be 
tra=
umatized from this whole issue of disgust.
